item.title: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP) Notes
item.description: Preamble https://www.isc2.org/Certifications/CSSLP This is a collection of notes I’ve taken for the CSSLP. Hopefully they are useful to you as well! I made a program to study for this test. Feel free to use it. https://github.com/HenryFBP/pyconsolequiz Secure Software Concepts Core Concepts Main concept is about restricting user access Confidentiality Keep info away from people who don’t NEED to know it Secret info remains secret Must understand what data needs to be kept secret
